name: Mahina Nui
desc: A spirited restaurant waitress from the People of the Springs.

value.name: Berry & Mint Burst
value.desc: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. A refreshing burst of Mint with Berries to sweeten the deal, it has an exquisite aroma.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
For Mahina Nui, the busy routine of mixing one cold drink after another gives her a deep sense of fulfillment. Perhaps it's this very pursuit of satisfaction, carried over from the restaurant to the gaming table, that lends a unique theme to this Genius Invokation TCG matchup.
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Start with 1 "People of the Springs" on the opponent's side of the field.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Rhodeia of Loch
customize.desc:
"Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
